availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander M. Stratton (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mildred A. Stratton. Father of Robert B. Stratton, Manford Stratton, Bell Stratton, and Alice Stratton. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Cobbs district, p. 108. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn District, p. 11. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District No. 4, p. 5. Find A Grave, "Alexander Mosby Stratton (1837-1887)," Memorial #8071378, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8071378 (accessed September 12, 2017).
